snippet: Several new Super Bowl advertisers are teasing the contents in advance and providing entire commercials before the game.
abstract: Stuart Elliott Advertising column; several new Super Bowl advertisers are teasing contents in advance and providing entire commercials online before the big game.
lead_paragraph: Several new Super Bowl advertisers are teasing the contents in advance and providing entire commercials before the game.

headline.seo: Marketers Start Super Bowl Campaigns Early
headline.main: Early Kickoff for Marketers at Super Bowl
headline.print_headline: Early Kickoff For Marketers At Super Bowl
